tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is very experienced and friendly. ** ***** ******* *********** *********. He always advices us how to become fit and healthy with regular yoga and exercises . That's what I respect him very much.

Doctor is good but the appointment booking through Practo is messed up. The booking is not honoured by the clinic. We had to take the appointment after reaching there, followed by wait time. Also, the fee was Rs. 100 more than what is shown on the app.

Although the Doc was late but the time and  explaination provided by the Doc compensated for that.

Visited him today as I have severe back pain. He did not even get up from his seat to examine the areas where it pains and took out 3 copies of exercise and asked to do. ** ***** ****** ****** * ****** ** ****** ******** *** ****** *** ******* *** ********* Not all exercise will work and can elevate the pain. Even after asking for that he said the one that you feel hard do not do it. We pay fees and spend time to see a doctor who can examine a patient and then suggest treatment. Not just to end conversation in 5 mins. I would not recommend him. Not a good  experience with doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Due to sport injury I had a pain in my heel back, the doctor was so focused on the advice for stretch exercise and physical ability **** ** ****** ******* *** **** ******** *** ********* ******* ** ******** ********** ******* ** ******** ********* And also wrote ******* Tendocare forte tablet which is Ok but the critical treatment is to rest and provide support to heel in proper way to recover fast. I have been struggling as the pain is huge and can not walk. I have to get second opinion now.

Not Good at all after all the reports like MRI and a as he suggest in prescription when I visited for further he didn't check reports the he need everything in picture all the MRI DVD which was given ******* *** ***** ******* ** *** ** **** *** ****** ** *** ********** *** he asked me to come back with new reports which I feel is better to change the doctor*** ** ****** **** ** ******** ** ********** not a good experience I ever had.

I stood for more than 30 min for the registration, still my number did not come. Somebody or the other from the staff kept disturbing the person at the counter and he was stuck with his work only. Very unprofessional behaviour by the clinic staff. I did not meet the doctor in the end. There should be a separate person to attend the issues from the fellow staff members.

The experience was a bit disappointing. Had to wait 1.5 hours to be able to consult the doctor for 5 mins. There were some exercises suggested, which
only made the pain get worse. Got the feeling that the doctor was in a hurry. Sadly, Had to go to another doctor the next week.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very friendly and well experienced....I haven't seen a doctor with such a high patience.... nothing bad to complain.... ********* ** **** *****...i had my ACL RECONSTRUCTION with him in APOLLO HEALTH CITY, and im very satisfied with him and also suggest every ortho patient to consult him.
It's was 550₹ in practo, they charged 650₹. On top of that he came an hour late. There was no proper reason why he came late
The doctor was really helpful and explained the problem in detail. He also shared some exercises for the knee pain

review: Doctor was very friendly and  he explained  about my issue very clearly and  cleared all my doubts

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: Explained about the problem clearly. Attended for a finger injury. Didnt have much waiting time too. Safe during this covid time

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He did a physical exam and was confident on what his diagnosis was. He was hopeful I'll recover within 3 weeks. I'm in my first week now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: In one word...Doc was not at all user-friendly and very hesitant to listen the problems and even if he didn't examine...I will nt recommend to go this doctor.... seriously I am very much disappointed....

Here first come first serve, no use of taking prior appointment. 
I am not sure, my problem is upper back problem or lower back pain problem

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I consulted Dr. Sharat twice, once for my wife and 2nd time for my father's knee. **** *** **** * **** *** ****** ****** I wish him good luck in his career.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very Experienced and Very Friendly Doctor *** ********* **********

He will recognize and wishes you even after a long gap.

Doctor is quit good and well experienced. 
Listen and understand my problem very clearly! Suggested all possible ways!
Great experience!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
* ******* ** ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** ******* ** ****
He did my father's bilateral hip replacement surgery. And my dad started walking just after 1 month. Yeah it seems to be magical but yeah whoever sees it believes it. ** ** * ***** ****** *** a great person as well. I am really thankful to him for what he has given to us. Thanks a lot Sir :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Visited for my mother's appointment. Didn't even listen to problem completely but straightaway started recommending to a rheumatologist. Didn't even see the previous reports I had from other orthopedist in a different city. Just wrote some tests and asked to lose weight. I had reports for most tests there with me but he did not allow us to speak. Seemed to be in super hurry and didn't listen to all the conditions. Won't recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Basically he is a very cool person. He explains everything in detail. I have visited him last year and this year as well. His behaviour is similar. He came to the clinic a bit late and apologised for that. He doesn't recommend for medicines or tests unless they are necessary.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ****** *** *** *** ********* ** *** ******* ********* He emphasized that a good lifestyle with physical activities is a must have. ***** **** ** ***** ** *** *** *** ********* ** *** ****** * **** He insisted i should be physically active and that would solve the issue. It has been 6 months since the appointment, ** ****** ** ***** ******* **** ******* *** ** ***** ** *** ***** *** ******* ***********
It was a pleasant experience. Doctor was very kind. He listened to my queries patiently. And he was down to earth.
Good. Undstand the priblem quickly and recommends  good solution. He can listen the problem carefully

Pretty decent person. Listened carefully to all my symptoms and scenarios for my severe shoulder pain.  Satisfied with his conclusions. We went to Apollo Health City (in Jubillee Hills). Awesome facilities it has.
** ******* ** ****, i was able to see recovery in 2-3 days only. I had pain for almost 2-3 weeks. Thanks
Booked appointment in practo @ 6 45 pm, But Doctor  is not available in the clinic, Not good experience

Happy with the explanation of condition but disappointed with the wait time. Booked an appointment at 6:20, met the doctor after 7:20. 
 This happens mostly.  Humble advice to administration- please change the slots basis the availability of doc.
****** *** **** *** waiting time was 1 hour. which is deficult . need to improve in this ,. because it will
Wel exprience Dr. Know the problems of patient. Give best advice, treatment, excercise , medication etc
